long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X Quotes Extension from Vietnamese X's Freak with Love.
Install and enabled.
When you open new tab, some very nice words in a X's song will show on screen. 
Let begin new day with X Japan.

If you like this extension, vote me!

*Remove Facebook Button
